meanings: (예감·추측 등이) be right, prove right, come true (=들어맞다)
(얻어맞다) be hit, be struck, (뺨을) be slapped, (여러 차례) be beaten
(총·벼락 등을) be hit (by), (총을) be shot, (벼락을) be struck
if the price is satisfactory[moderate, reasonable]

vlive.korean: 맞으면 몇 개야? 944개였나? How many do we get? 944 stickers? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.5
vlive.english: How many do we get? 944 stickers?

vlive.korean: 내가 맞으면 어떡할 거야? What if I was correct about it? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TWICE] 💖울 겨울의 공주님들은 황금미모띠라네요🧡 (TWICE talking about Frozen 2)
vlive.english: What if I was correct about it?

vlive.korean: 기다려봐 - 야 내가 맞으면 어떡할 거야? Wait. - What if I was correct? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TWICE] 💖울 겨울의 공주님들은 황금미모띠라네요🧡 (TWICE talking about Frozen 2)
vlive.english: Wait. - What if I was correct?

vlive.korean: 그러면 모음... 모음까지 맞으면 이건 대박이야 - 모음? OK. How about a favorite vowel? If we have the same answer again, that'd be epic. - Vowel? 듣기 View video CASPER RADIO : 권정열 고영배의 십란한밤 #120 with 첸(CHEN) of 엑소(EXO)
vlive.english: OK. How about a favorite vowel? If we have the same answer again, that'd be epic. - Vowel?

vlive.korean: 그럼 약간 몸이 가려운 거 알아요? 너무 차가운 데 있다가 뜨거운 물 맞으면 - 그래요? Do you know it feels itchy? When your body is too cold... - Really? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈이와 태현이 질문 받았다 요!
vlive.english: Do you know it feels itchy? When your body is too cold... - Really?

examples.korean: If it doesn’t fit, you can always take it back. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것이 안 맞으면 언제든지 다시 갖다 줄 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If it doesn’t fit, you can always take it back. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Put a tick if the answer is correct and a cross if it’s wrong. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 답이 맞으면 체크 표시를 하고 틀렸으면 X 표를 하시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Put a tick if the answer is correct and a cross if it’s wrong. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If it doesn’t fit, take it back and the store will exchange it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그게 안 맞으면 다시 가져가. 가게에서 교환해 줄 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If it doesn’t fit, take it back and the store will exchange it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What is sauce for the goose is sauce for the gander 듣기 Add to Wordbook 암거위에 맞는 소스는 숫거위에게도 맞다.(한쪽에 맞으면 다른 쪽에도 맞다.) (서양속담, 용서속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: What is sauce for the goose is sauce for the gander Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If your prices are agreeable, we would be happy to place our first order. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 귀사의 가격과 맞으면 기꺼이 첫 주문을 발주하겠습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: If your prices are agreeable, we would be happy to place our first order. Add to Wordbook
